thread.title: Deepika Padukone flaunts the latest Tissot Chemin des Tourelles at the campaign shoot in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Deepika Padukone flaunts the latest Tissot Chemin des Tourelles at the campaign shoot in Mumbai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Deepika Padukone flaunts the latest Tissot Chemin des Tourelles at the campaign shoot in Mumbai
text:
Deepika Padukone flaunts a watch from the latest Tissot Chemin des Tourelles and classic Le Locle series at the brand's 2016 campaign shoot.
The timepieces are authentic and accessible, using special materials, advanced functionality and meticulous design detail to create wristwatches that are both precise and stylish.
